content: He does not need to respond to stupid questions. If I even remotely thought he was an anti semite I’d happily chime in. He isn't and so get off this subject. It is a waste of space. Plus the question by the reporter was very dumb. It insinuated the President was the cause of antisemitism. As any member of the tribe know this hatred is cyclical. It ebbs and flows. It never really goes away. Vigilance is called for but not falsely accusing someone of a non existent offense. False headline, false story and fake news.
